original_title: 処女喪失 処女喪失の瞬間、完全収録！ 「趣味が書道の生粋のお嬢様」 本澤朋美
overview: Tomomi who became a college student. She couldn't keep up with the erotic conversations between her female friends, and she jumped into the world of AV, thinking that she was the only one who was embarrassed by her virginity. pain? sad? embarrassed? happy? The emotional tears at the end are a must-see!
title: Virgin Deflowering. Complete Video Of The Moment Of Virgin Deflowering! 'A Pure Young Lady, Her Hobby Is Calligraphy.' Tomomi Motozawa.
